title: The films of Kenneth Anger - vol 2 (1964-1981) / DVD9
description:
The films of Kenneth Anger - vol 2 (1964-1981) <a href="
http://www.imdb.com/name/nm0001910/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.imdb.com/name/nm0001910/</a>

Cinematic magician, legendary provocateur, author of the infamous Hollywood Babylon books and creator of some of the most striking and beautiful works in the history of film, Kenneth Anger is a singular figure in post-war American culture.
A major influence on everything from the films of Martin Scorsese, Rainer Werner Fassbinder and David Lynch to the pop art of Andy Warhol to MTV, Anger&#039;s work serves as a talisman of universal symbols and personal obsessions, combining myth, artifice and ritual to render cinema with the power of a spell or incantation.

This DVD covers the second half of Anger&#039;s career, from his legendary Scorpio Rising to his breathtaking phantasmagoria Lucifer Rising, 

Contains the films:
Scorpio Rising (1964)
Kustom Kar Kommandos (1965)
Invocation of My Demon Brother (1969)
Rabbit&#039;s Moon (1979 version)
Lucifer Rising (1981)

Ripped with DVD-Shrink. Untouched DVD9. 
Released by Fantoma and comes in a beautiful digipack including a 48 page full color book with extensive info and rare pictures about all the films. 
It is well worth the money to buy this DVD if youÃƒâ€šÃ‚Â´re a Kenneth Anger fan.
